findings.title: Potential unauthorized script upgrade
findings.description: The smart contract may allow unauthorized upgrades to its scripts.

findings.title: Minting of unlimited number of sundae tokens
findings.description: The contract allows minting an unlimited number of Sundae tokens.

findings.title: approve
findings.description: Potential security vulnerability in approve function.

findings.title: Transfer
findings.description: executes transfers of a specified number of tokens to a specified address

findings.title: transferFrom
findings.description: Potential vulnerability in transferFrom function allowing a spender to withdraw a set number of tokens from a specified account.

findings.title: permit
findings.description: The permit function has an external call marked with 🛑 symbol indicating a potential security risk.

findings.title: Unprotected mint Function
findings.description: The mint function is declared as external and does not have any access modifiers, making it vulnerable to unauthorized calls.

findings.title: burn
findings.description: N/A

findings.title: Unprotected Swap Function
findings.description: Multiple unprotected swap functions are found in the contract.

findings.title: Skim Function Vulnerability
findings.description: The skim function has a vulnerability marked with 🛑 symbol.

findings.title: N/A
findings.description: N/A

findings.title: Unprotected Initialize Function
findings.description: The initialize function is declared as external and does not have any access modifiers, making it vulnerable to unauthorized calls.

findings.title: updateMarketingWallet
findings.description: External function updateMarketingWallet allows onlyOwner to execute, potential security risk.

findings.title: excludeFromFee
findings.description: The 'isExcludedFromFee' function allows unauthorized access to exclude certain addresses from fees.

findings.title: includeInFee
findings.description: The 'includeInFee' function does not properly handle fee inclusion, potentially leading to incorrect calculations.

findings.title: setBuyFee
findings.description: The setBuyFee function has a potential vulnerability due to its external access and onlyOwner restriction.
